name: Flips and Flops
description:
This was made in about 10 minutes, and used a sprite from a game i made.

PS: the ten-pack wine glasses from the Lancing asda are not wine glasses, they are more of a mix between a chardonnay glass and a cocktail glass. It has an uncurved parabaloid - if it had a lip to it, it would be a cold beverage glass, but it's not.
